title: Lachlan Morton wins Evolution Gravel, but there’s more to it: ‘I want to have an experience that I’ll carry with me for life’
content:
The EF Education Pro Cycling alt rider won the 850km gravel ultra in Tanzania this week and got exactly what he was looking for.

Read the full article at Lachlan Morton wins Evolution Gravel, but there’s more to it: ‘I want to have an experience that I’ll carry with me for life’ on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
